name: [Art Assets] Now You See Me
description:
Hey! This is a pack of Art Assets I created for the game Now You See Me for Ludum dare 48.

Feel free to reuse them as long as you credit me (https://haiyoooo.itch.io/) ! Thank you! :) I'd love to see what you made too ^^

Art Pack Contains:

  • Monster.png
  • Monsters.png - Spritesheet of 6 different monsters + a heart
  • Smoke.png - used for FX
  • Wall.png - tileable

Play the Game: https://haiyoooo.itch.io/now-you-see-me
